dc_title_s: Map of the battle field of Gettysburg, July 1st, 2nd, 3rd 1863
dc_description_s: Positions of troops compiled and added for the government by John B. Bachelder.; "The survey was ordered by Brevet Major General A.A. Humphreys, Chief of Engineers, and conducted under Brevet Major General G.K. Warren, Major of Engineers."; Relief shown by form lines and spot heights.|72 x 68 centimeters|Scale 1:12,000; 1 inch represents 1000 feet|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Published by authority of the Hon. the Secretary of War,  Office of the Chief of Engineers U.S. Army (Washington,  D.C.?)
